bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Ethernet Amendment 5: Specification and Management Parameters for Interspersing Express Traffic
IEEE Standard for Ethernet Amendment 5: Specification and Management Parameters for Interspersing Express Traffic
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 802.3br-2016 (Amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2015 as amended by IEEE St802.3bw-2015, IEEE Std 802.3by-2016, IEEE Std 802.3bq-2016, and IEEE Std 802.3bp-2016)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2015 specifies additions to and appropriate modifications to add support for interspersing express traffic over a single physical link.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
